message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway and sell it to me for $150?

Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $150. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $175. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $160?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $170. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $165. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $168. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?

I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a final offer of $160. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll take the product.
